content: Hi Megan! How's it going? Been up to anything cool lately? I started walking my pups around the 'hood and it's been so fun. You have any furry friends?
Hey Jeff! All's good here, thanks. Nice that you're walking your pups. I've got a golden lab called Brian - he's a real cutie.
Awww, Brian is so cute! He looks like he's having a great time outdoors. How long have you had him?
I adopted Brian as a pup 3 years ago. Actually, it was in January, I remember how cold that day was.
That's great! Been a dog lover for long?
Oh yeah, always loved dogs! Growing up I'd ride horses, and animals just make me so happy.
Wow, that's amazing! Horses are so cool. Do you still have the chance to ride them?
Yeah, I go riding whenever I can. Helps me clear my mind and stay active.

That's awesome! Having activities to relax is so important. Hey, I started taking drum lessons since we last talked. Had my first lesson on just a week ago. It's great for getting' my emotions out and chillin'. Got any hobbies to de-stress?
Awesome, Jeff! I think, playing drums is so satisfying. Besides horseback and biking, I enjoy painting and gardening. It's therapeutic.
That sounds great, Megan! Painting and gardening can be really calming and rewarding. Do you have a fav thing to paint or grow?
Painting landscapes and flowers is so fun. Love how the colors are so vibrant and it takes me to a zen spot.
Wow, that sounds great. Must be nice to escape into a world of colors, just like my painting last week.
Wow, that's a great painting! What inspired you?
Thanks, Megan! Nature's peacefulness and a sunset's beauty really inspired me.
Yeah, your painting looks great! Nature inspires some awesome art. This one is from a hike I took recently.
Wow, Megan! That lake campfire looks awesome. Did you camp out on your hike?
Thanks Jeff! Nah, didn't camp out on that hike, but it was such a peace spot. Love nature!

Nature's so calming, right? It's awesome how sitting around a campfire and hearing that crackling sound helps your mind relax. Plus, when I go camping, my dogs love it. They get to explore and sniff around. It's way better when you have someone to share those moments with.

Hey Jeff! Long time no chat. Phew, Tuesday was hectic. My non-profit was raising funds and we did so well. A bunch of money was raised which is going to help a lot of kids. Feels good to help out but sometimes it can be overwhelming.
Hey Megan! That's great news about your non-profit. Super proud of you for all that you do! How do you stay so chill during hard times?

I appreciate the kind words. Can be tough staying chill during tough times, but gotta remember why I'm doing this. Having a positive impact on the kids is what keeps me going. Plus, riding bikes and playing with my pup are a good way to clear my head. What do you do to handle challenging situations?
Yeah I get ya. I use drumming to work through tough times - it's so therapeutic. Oh, here's a pic of my fur babies. Whenever I'm feeling down, they put a smile on my face.
Aw, they're so cute! What're their names? Do they cheer you up when times are tough?

Thanks! Bailey's on the left and Jack on the right. They make me so happy, even when I'm sad. I love how they brighten my mood with their playful energy and unconditional love. Do you have any pets besides Brian that comfort you?

Bailey and Jack, great names! I have another dog, Layla. She is a Corgi. I adopted her just a month ago. She just a pup. But she so cheerful and such a comfort for me. She and Brian are my rock, always cheering me up and providing comfort. I love having them both around and taking them for walks. They always so loyal and help me through tough times.
That's great, Megan. Glad Brian and Layla is helping you out. It's amazing how pets do that. We went on a different trail last week. It was nice to get out of the ordinary.
Wow, looks great! Relaxing spot? Did you and your pets like the trail?
Yeah, so peaceful. The dogs were loving the adventure, sniffing every little thing. A perfect way to chill and relax. Hey, when's the last time you went horseback riding?
Yeah! Last time I was riding in October. It was a ride through a forest. It was a great adventure!
Wow, that's cool! Riding horses in the forest must be peaceful. I can imagine the calm and connection with nature. Here's a pic of me drumming. It's my escape and calms my mind.
Cool! Drumming seems like a great way to de-stress. What kind of music do you like?
Yeah, rock and alternative music are my favorite! The energy and rhythm really speak to me - it's like an outlet.
Cool! Do you have any favs?
My fave bands are Foo Fighters and Red Hot Chili Peppers. Their music always puts me in a great mood.
That's awesome! I'm a big fan of Foo Fighters and Red Hot Chili Peppers too. I saw Foo Fighters in concert 4 years ago and it was awesome! Did you ever go to a concert that stuck with you?
Cool look! I'm glad that you liked it! I've been on a concert that amazed me. It was 3 years ago and it was a band that entered the stage on horses! it's was such a blast!
Wow! I bet it was! What do you remember about that concert? What stuck out to you?
Wow, the concert was great! That horse entrance was awesome and made it a night to remember. It really stuck with me.
Yeah, it sounds epic! Live concerts have such great energy. How did the entrance stand out?
The band rode horses through the crowd and up to the stage, making a memorable entrance.
Wow, horses make any performance so much cooler! It must've been incredible!
That was so awesome! Music, crowd energy and the band on horses. What a cool combo! It was truly unforgettable.
Yeah, it's cool how a concert is more special when there's something unexpected. Experiences like that last forever.
Yeah, those unexpected moments at live shows are so memorable and captivating. They make an impression that'll stay with you forever! Hey Megan! Long time no chat. Guess what I got on the 10th?
Hey Jeff! Great to hear from you. Wow, that drum set looks awesome! That's what you bought? Have you just started playing?
Yeah, I just started playing. Got myself a drum set. Drums are an important part of my life, helping me express my feelings and find peace.
Wow, Jeff! Drums have a big effect on our emotions, don't they? It's great to have a way to express ourselves and find calm. Do drums help you deal with hard times?

Yeah, Megan, drumming has really helped me. It helps me sort through things and get rid of my feelings. When something's bugging me, I'll sit down and beat on the drums. It's like a kind of meditation. And at the end, I feel so much better, like a weight's been taken away.
It's great how playing drums can be therapeutic and calming. What made you take it up?
